casebody.data:
LOTHIAN CASSIDY, LLC, et al., petitioners,
v.
LOTHIAN EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT II, L.P.; and Israel G. Grossman, petitioner,
v.
Lothian Oil Incorporated, et al. No. 13-522. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
